title: cmd/5g, cmd/6g: -S flag has no effect
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

The gc compiler flag -S has no effect on tip.

go tool 5g -S test.go 
go tool 6g -S test.go 


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Want: Assembly.
Have: Compiles test.go.


Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

go version devel +24bc2c8febe3 Sat Dec 14 10:03:11 2013 +1100 darwin/amd64

I have not tested cmd/8g.
